title: KHR_materials_iridescence glTF extension
description: glTF extension that defines an iridescence effect.

iridescenceTexture.gltf_detailedDescription: The iridescence intensity texture. Stored in channel R with default linear value 1.0 of the iridescence texture.

iridescenceIOR.description: The index of refraction of the dielectric thin-film layer.

iridescenceThicknessMinimum.description: The minimum thickness of the thin-film layer.

iridescenceThicknessMaximum.description: The maximum thickness of the thin-film layer.
iridescenceThicknessMaximum.gltf_detailedDescription: The maximum thickness of the thin-film layer. This value will be used as the overall thickness if no iridescenceThicknessTexture is provided.

iridescenceThicknessTexture.description: The thickness texture of the thin-film layer to blend between the minimum and maximum thickness.
iridescenceThicknessTexture.gltf_detailedDescription: The thickness texture of the thin-film layer to blend between the minimum and maximum thickness. Stored in channel G with default linear value 1.0 of the iridescence texture.
